name: statically
content:
statically adverb
(NOT MOVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not moving or not changing: As the singers sing more or less statically, the dancers move about in front of them. Hold each position statically for at least 15 seconds.
computing
  specialized in a way that is fixed and does not change: Statically linked software usually loads faster. Each task has a stack that can be statically allocated. Compare
dynamically
More examplesFewer examplesThe camera often moves around the room, while the action takes place statically.The foot pressure distribution was measured statically and dynamically.You can set a system property either statically or dynamically.

statically adverb
(ELECTRICITY)
involving static electricity (= an electrical charge that collects on the surface of objects): statically charged The plastic film is statically charged, so it will cling and protect the area being painted.
More examplesFewer examplesThat's why your hair stands on end when it's statically charged.Once a material has become statically charged, it will repel anything with the same charge.
